My Work


Travelblog is a Laravel project for a blog where travllers can register and post blog articles for everyone to read.
Every blogger can only update and delete the articles the blogger has made.
The admin has the rights to BREAD all the data in the database by using the adminpanel.

Project Github

Snake is a html and javascript project the snake movement is coded with animation frame
to get the snake to move across the screen.
When the snake gets in touch with its self the game is over.

Project Github

The canvas is html and javascript project when the mouse hovers over the page and a dot comes in contact with the mouse we use javascript to make the dots get bigger


Project Github

This weather project works with openweathermap API.
When we search for a city we use the fetch API method to get the data
from openweathermap.

Project Github

The klok is a javascript and css project where we use this both to create
the round style and with javascript to get the time and make the time move.


Project Github

This grid template is made out of html and css it can be used for creating a fast template for a home page. The grid gives us flexibility to make great personalized websites.
